data.title: I‚Äôm a paying customer and this app hasn‚Äôt worked for 6 months
data.content: This is my first review ever. I really loved this app when it worked. But for the last 6 months I‚Äôve been receiving no notifications on my iPhone 13 mini, running the latest software on both the app and my phone. I‚Äôve contacted technical support about this, provided robust technical details about my device and app, and I have repeatedly been told that it‚Äôs a planned fix in a future update. However, there have been about 40-50 app updates since my initial request, and the only notifications I receive are to ‚ÄúKeep my streak alive!‚Äù I didn‚Äôt want to write this review. But if you‚Äôre going to be a paying customer, you should be aware of this. Thanks for reading.

data.title: Excellent App, notifications have stopped
data.content:
The daily affirmations I receive by notification in this app have been truly life changing for me this year.

Unfortunately the push notifications have stopped recently, with no reason as to why. I have tried to find the solution in notification settings, uninstalled and reinstalled the app but not had any luck. 

Please do advice as I am a huge advocate and ambassador for the app and its benefits now!
data.author: IBrook

data.title: Great for Cultivating Your Own Motivation and Encouragement
data.content: Of all the apps out there like this, I find this one to be the most effective. I use it every single day. It‚Äôs easy because I love the ‚Äústreak‚Äù concept. I have mine set to spew out little nuggets at me all day long so the app can catch me at any time no matter what kind of mood I maybe in. The only thing I have a problem with is that daily timer thing. Once it disappears, if you‚Äôve tapped a portion of the screen on accident, you can‚Äôt get it back. How do I get back to the part of the app that does the daily 15 minute-long training? I accidentally touched my screen and it disappeared before it finished. Plus, I can‚Äôt *always* get to it at the originally programmed time. Things come up. Life be life-ing. So why not make a way where I can just find it in the app and do it when I have the time available if I happen to miss my regularly appointed time?
